name: There will be only one builder
name_original: There will be only one builder
description:
Player 1:
WASD - move
TFGH - rotate
Space - jump
Shift - shoot
Q - build
E + Q - change build position
E  without  Q - change weapon

Player 2 and 3 (Joystics):
Left stick - move
Right stick - rotate

A - jump
B - build

LT - shoot
RT + B - change build position
RT without  B - change weapon


This game was made for my birthday party.
